law.text:
KRS 304.17A-600 to 304.17A-633 shall apply to any insurer that covers citizens of the Commonwealth under a health benefit plan. An insurer shall maintain written procedures for:
Determining whether a requested service, treatment, drug, or device is covered under the terms of a covered person's health benefit plan;
Making utilization review determinations; and
Notifying covered persons, authorized persons, and providers acting on behalf of covered persons of its determinations.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000.
